title: Spicy Chorizo & Manchego Baguette
short_description: A fiery Spanish-inspired delight with smoky chorizo and rich Manchego cheese.

instructions.step: Slice baguette horizontally, not all the way through.
Layer sliced chorizo and Manchego cheese inside the baguette.
Drizzle with a touch of olive oil and a pinch of smoked paprika.
Wrap in foil and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until cheese is melted and baguette is heated through. Unwrap for the last 2 minutes for a crispier crust.
